title: Stat 151 - Introduction to Statistical Computing
format: html
---

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| eval: false
#| message: false
#| warning: false
#| results: markup
source("schedule.R")

library(gt)

schedule |>
  # bind_rows(tibble(Week = 16, Topic = "Finals Week")) |>
  tidyr::replace_na(list("Important Notes" = "", Topic =  "Finals")) |>
  mutate(Topic = if_else(Week < 16, sprintf("<a href='https://unl-statistics.github.io/stat151/weeks/week-%02d.html'> %s </a>", Week, Topic), Topic)) |>
  group_by(Week, Topic) |>
  summarize(`Important Notes` = paste(`Important Notes`, collapse = "<br>")) |>
  ungroup() |>
  gt::gt() |>
  gt::fmt_markdown(columns = c(Topic)) |>
  gt::fmt_markdown(columns = `Important Notes`) |>
  gt::as_raw_html()|>
  writeLines(con = "schedule-table.html")
```
